# <a name="replying-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="6c94b-102">Odpovedanie v službe Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6c94b-102">Replying in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6c94b-103">Odpovedať na jednu správu v čase:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6c94b-103">To reply to one message at a time:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="6c94b-104">V zozname správ vyberte správu, ktorú chcete odpovedať.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6c94b-104">In your message list, choose the message that you want to reply to.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="6c94b-105">V hornom rohu podokna správy vyberte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6c94b-105">At the top right of the message pane, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="6c94b-106">**Odpoveď** alebo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6c94b-106">**Reply** or</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="6c94b-107">**Odpovedať všetkým**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6c94b-107">**Reply all**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="6c94b-108">Napíšte správu a vyberte položku **Odoslať**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6c94b-108">Type your message and then select **Send**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6c94b-109">Automaticky odpovedať na všetky správy:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6c94b-109">To automatically reply to all messages:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="6c94b-110">ísť na</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6c94b-110">Go to</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
<span data-ttu-id="6c94b-111">**Nastavenia** > **Zobraziť Outlook nastavenia** > **Mail** > **Automatické odpovede** otvoriť [nastavenia automatických odpovedí](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/mail/automaticReplies).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6c94b-111">**Settings** > **View all Outlook Settings** > **Mail** > **Automatic replies** to open your [Automatic replies settings](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/mail/automaticReplies).</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="6c94b-112">Vyberte prepínač **zapnúť automatické odpovede** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6c94b-112">Select the **Turn on automatic replies** toggle.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="6c94b-113">Začiarknutím políčka **odosielať odpovede iba počas časového obdobia** umožňuje:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6c94b-113">Selecting the **Send replies only during a time period** check box enables you to:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="6c94b-114">Keď vyberiete iba odoslať odpoveď.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6c94b-114">Only send replies when you choose.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="6c94b-115">Ak nenastavíte časové obdobie, automatická odpoveď zostáva na, kým ho nevypnete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6c94b-115">If you don't set a time period, your automatic reply remains on until you turn it off.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="6c94b-116">Blok kalendára</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6c94b-116">Block your calendar</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="6c94b-117">Automaticky odmietať nové pozvánky</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6c94b-117">Automatically decline new invitations</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="6c94b-118">Odmietnuť a zrušiť moje stretnutia počas tohto obdobia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6c94b-118">Decline and cancel my meetings during this period</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="6c94b-119">Do poľa správy zadajte správu odoslať používateľom v čase vašej neprítomnosti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6c94b-119">In the message box, type a message to send to people during the time you're away.</span></span>
5. <span data-ttu-id="6c94b-120">Odosielať len odpovede na vaše kontakty, začiarknite políčko **odosielať odpovede len kontakty** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6c94b-120">To only send replies to your contacts, select the **Send replies to contacts only** check box.</span></span>
6. <span data-ttu-id="6c94b-121">Kliknite na tlačidlo **Uložiť**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6c94b-121">Select **Save**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6c94b-122">Ďalšie informácie o [Automatické posielanie ďalej v službe Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/14614626-9855-48dc-a986-dec81d07b1a0?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6c94b-122">Learn more about [automatic forwarding in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/14614626-9855-48dc-a986-dec81d07b1a0?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
